name: Chicken Alfredo Pita Pizza
author: Jeri Panek
summary: Something I put together after the inspiration of my daughter's 'Pita Pizza.' She liked this one a lot and wanted me to submit it! It's tasty so you might want to make more than one for yourself! This recipe makes about 4 pitas.
ingredients: 6  small frozen chicken tenders, thawed and sliced
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Season chicken with garlic salt; cook and stir in hot oil until no longer pink in the middle, about 5 minutes
Spread 1 tablespoon hummus over one side of each of the pita rounds nearly to the edges
Top with layers of pesto and
Sprinkle a layer of chopped spinach over the alfredo sauce; top with even portions of chicken, artichoke hearts, feta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and mushrooms
Drizzle remaining olive oil over the pizzas
Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted and crust on pitas is slightly brown, about 15 minutes
